summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Twitter Score v1.0 APIs - all endpoints working correctly with proper formula implementation, validation, and expected behaviors
passed_tests: Connections module health /api/connections/health - module enabled and healthy
GET /api/connections/twitter-score/info - returns version 1.0.0, correct weights (35%, 20%, 20%, 15%, 10%), grades S/A/B/C/D, penalties structure
GET /api/connections/twitter-score/mock - returns 5 examples with 4 unique grades, scores ranging 352-774
GET /api/connections/twitter-score/config - returns complete config with correct thresholds (S>=850, A>=700, B>=550, C>=400, D>=0)
POST /api/connections/twitter-score (high quality) - high influence + low risk produces score=733, grade=A, confidence=HIGH with 3 drivers
POST /api/connections/twitter-score (low quality) - high red_flags + HIGH risk produces score=274, grade=D with concerns and penalties
POST /api/connections/twitter-score/batch - processes 3 accounts correctly with 3 unique grades, score range 477
Score formula verification - high influence + low risk = high score (784, grade=A) with proper component values
Input validation - properly rejects missing account_id with 400 error
Batch validation - properly rejects empty accounts array with 400 error
